SiteNameAddress: ""Former Hope High School, Tanhouse Road, Skelmersdale""
DevelopmentDescription: "" Site promoted through the SHELAA, it is partly covered by a policy EN3 (green / open recreational space) designation.  However, the remainder of the site can be developed for residential development.  Yield of 27 reflects the net developable area.""

OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
PermissionType: Planning permission granted under an order
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site has a Local Development Order: 2015/1328/LDO with a figure of upto 128 dwellings on the site.""

SiteNameAddress: ""Site of Former Sports Centre, Digmoor Road, Skelmersdale""
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
PermissionType: Planning permission granted under an order
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site has a Local Development Order 2015/1327/LDO with the figure of 45 dwellings on the site.""

SiteNameAddress: ""Site of Former Greaves Hall Hospital, Greaves Hall Avenue, Banks""
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site promoted through the SHELAA. Outline consent granted, and Reserved Matters has since been approved (2016/0706/ARM) some conditions discharged. 2018/0732/CON still awaiting decision.""
Notes: ""2016/0706/ARM For 128 dwellings light industrial units and assoicated road and infrastructure including details of appearance landscaping layout and scale - Pending decision.""

OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site promoted through SHELAA and has outline planning permission (2013/0517/OUT) for 6 residential dwellings, and outline permission for 2 dwellings (2017/0103/OUT).  Application to vary conditions on the 2013 consent has been approved (2017/0351/FUL). Not started on site as outline consent.""

SiteNameAddress: "" Site of Former 111 Aughton Street, Ormskirk""
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Expired planning permission for 6 apartments and ground floor commercial units (2013/0975/OUT).""
Notes: ""2013/1002/OUT erection of mixed use residential and office building including details of landscaping expired 29/10/2016.""

SiteNameAddress: ""Bull And Dog Inn, 5 Liverpool Road South, Burscough""
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site promoted through the SHELAA.  The site had planning permission for the construction of 6 new dwellings, but this has now expired (2014/0079/FUL).""
Notes: ""2014/0079/FUL construction of 6 new build dwellings and conversion of existing barn to 1 4 bed dwelling plus associated parking driveways and landscaping. ""

SiteNameAddress: ""Downholland Bridge Business Park, Mairscough Lane, Downholland""
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site promoted through the SHELAA.  Outline permission for 6 dwellings (2015/0959/OUT) expired 06/11/2018, no discharge of conditions applications submitted.""
Notes: ""2015/0959/OUT construction of six dwellings following demolition of existing commercial premises including details of access layout and scale.""

OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site promoted through the SHELAA.  Full planning permission for 7 dwellings (2015/0951/FUL).  Conditions have been discharged (2018/0545/CON).  Not started.""
Notes: ""2015/0951/FUL residential development including 4 three bedroom detached dwellings and associated external works.""

SiteNameAddress: ""Land to the rear of 69-75 Town Green Lane, Aughton""
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site promoted through the SHELAA.  Outline planning permission for 5 dwellings (2015/1186/OUT).  Consent expires 27/06/2019.""
Notes: ""2015/06/1186/OUT residential development to provide up to 5 dwtached dwellings including details of access.""

OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site promoted through the SHELAA.  Outline planning permission for 12 apartments (2015/0723/OUT).  Discharge of conditions submitted (2018/0959/CON); awaiting determination.""
Notes: ""2015/0723/OUT development of 12 residential flats with associated car parking and green space following the demolition of the existing public house.""

OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site promoted through SHELAA. Had full planning permission for 12 self contained flats (2013/0823/FUL) but this has expired.  The premesis still functions as a bar/nightclub.""
Notes: ""2013/0823/FUL demolition of existing social club and erection of two 3 storey apartment blocks comprising 12 2 bedroom self contained flats and provision for 15 car parking spaces.""

OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site promoted throught SHELAA.  Site is parked due to multiple ownership constraints.  Site had PP for a mixed use development for ground floor commercial units and 17 apartments (2011/0148/FUL) but this has now expired.""
Notes: "" 2011/0148/FUL mixed use development comprising 2 commercial units and 17 3 bed aprtments with associated amenity space and car parking.""

SiteNameAddress: ""Former Silver Birch Hotel, Floron, Birch Green, Skelmersdale""
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site has permission for 4 commercial units and 18 self contained apartments (2016/0832/FUL); expires 12/2019.  All conditions require discharging.""
Notes: "" 2016/0832/FUL demolition of existing vacant commercial building and construction of mixed use development comprising 4 retail/commercial units and 18 self contained apartments with associated car parking and landscaping.""

SiteNameAddress: ""Garages to the east of Arnian Court, Molyneux Road, Skelmersdale""
OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site has outline permission for the erection of 7 dwellings (2017/0185/OUT).  Approval of Reserved Matters application has been submitted for 4 dwellings (2017/1139/ARM) which is awaiting determination. ""
Notes: ""2017/0185/OUT demolition of 31 lock up garages and outline application including means of access for the redevelopment of the site to provide up to 7 dwellings.""

OwnershipStatus: Not owned by a public authority
DevelopmentDescription: ""Site submitted in SHELAA Call for Sites 2017.""
